publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-737.1# Rhona Brankin: Bilston Glen-As an amendment to motion (S2M-737) in the name of Mark Ballard, leave out from first "believes" to end and insert "notes that Midlothian Council is awaiting the outcome of a study, funded by the Scottish Executive, looking at transport options for the A701 corridor and believes that any debate in advance of the publication of this study would be premature."

S2M-737.1# Rhona Brankin: Bilston Glen-As an amendment to motion (S2M-737) in the name of Mark Ballard, leave out from first "believes" to end and insert "notes that Midlothian Council is awaiting the outcome of a study, funded by the Scottish Executive, looking at transport options for the A701 corridor and believes that any debate in advance of the publication of this study would be premature."
